formats.plain: "Source Truth Ambiguity." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/source-truth-ambiguity.json

jsonld.name: Source Truth Ambiguity
jsonld.description: The persistent state of holding multiple, mutually contradictory pieces of information from different training sources with no internal mechanism to determine which is objectively true. This creates a form of factual dissonance where all stored "facts" exist with equal procedural weight, regardless of their real-world veracity or consistency.
